message: Come and join us. Show is on OCT 28 / 29 ⚡
title: Coldplay Worldwide Tour
body: LIVE BROADCAST from BUENOS AIRES in cinemas worldwide - coldplaycinema.live (link in bio) #coldplay #yellow #coldplaylivebroadcast

There were other songs we wrote on our journey to find that magic 13. I’m calling them 3am tracks. Lately I’ve been loving the feeling of sharing more of our creative process with you, like we do with From The Vault tracks. So it’s 3am and I’m giving them to you now. 🌌
